name: Liberty_Container_Application
description: An example of deploying a container using Kubernetes style yaml files

edges.from: Show Current Running Apps in Cluster (tneal)

edges.to: Show Current Running Apps in Cluster (tneal)

offsets.name: Show Current Running Apps in Cluster (tneal)

properties.scriptBody:
#!/bin/bash
export KUBECONFIG=./kubeconfig
oc project rlange
echo "I am user $(id)"
echo "My Home directory is $HOME"
echo "My current OpenShift project is $(oc project)"
echo "Pods running in this namespace/project are"
oc get pods

cachedAuthTokenRestriction.name: System Default
cachedAuthTokenRestriction.description: Used by default for any plugin steps without a specified token restriction

properties.scriptBody:
#!/bin/bash
export KUBECONFIG=./kubeconfig
oc login --token=${p:environment/oc-auth-token} --server=https://c107-e.us-south.containers.cloud.ibm.com:30085
oc project tneal

echo "I am user $(id)"
echo "My Home directory is $HOME"
echo "My current OpenShift project is $(oc project)"
echo "Pods running in this namespace/project are"
oc get pods
